reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress cute and perfect for birthday outings, with good quality and comfort that isn't itchy. The sizing receives mixed feedback - while some find it true to size, others say the bottoms are too big. The stretchiness and see-through aspect also get mixed reviews, with some praising the stretchiness while others note it's not stretchy enough, and some find it see-through while others consider it pretty see-through. Value for money opinions are divided, with some saying it's worth the price while others find it overpriced at $40. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Please read
items.body: Okay because some of you are slow here's some honest feedback: -If the Dress is rising it's not because it's too big. Baby love it's too tight size up. This is for the size small and plus size girlies. -slightly sheer. -Dress is definitely short. I have a small waist but thick thighs. I had to return it because it's too short. -cute dress Read more

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Arrived Ripped!!!!
items.body: Ripped straight out of the package and the seam is twisted from the back all the way to the front. Uncomfortable and poorly made. Not worth it. Read more
items.author: Mary

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars As pictured, good sizing, nice quality for the price for a quick night out
items.body: I gave this item 4 stars. The item came as picked with all items the dress the gloves and tights. Iâ€™m 5â€™2â€ 150lbs and wear a size 36C bra. I ordered a small. The dress had fit but couldâ€™ve been a little tighter as the dress keep riding up while walking/sitting down and the tights were super small I had to stretch them and even then they still were kind of too small. I had nails on so they had ripped some of the lace tights around the seams as I was trying to put them on. I didnâ€™t get to wear the gloves. But overall satisfied only needed for one night. Color matched and material/ quality was good for the price. The dress is somewhat see through. Read more
items.author: Hazel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy red 3 piece outfit
items.body: This three piece outfit was the bomb! I totally recommend wearing for a date night out! It is very comfortable. Not see through, the material used is thick and it makes everything feel and fit right. Read more

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Pink, Burgundy, Leopard, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
